column1: The '''Roper Family''' was a young family of [[Hobbits]], an offshoot of the [[Gamgee Family]].

column2: Andwise Gamgee]] adopted the surname Roper in honour of the [[Ropers
column3: family trade]], which was started two generations earlier.<ref>{{App

column1: :There are several Hobbits with the surname Roper in the game. Some of the more important ones are Lilabet Roper and Sheldon Roper.
